sources.title: The Merry Widow (1934) [Colorized, 4K, 60FPS]
sources.description: The Merry Widow is a 1934 black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2022 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab @  https://colab.research.google.com    Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing:  https://github.com/jantic/DeOldify  A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS:  https://rife-vfi.github.io    A.I. Upscaling to 4K:  https://ffmpeg.org    GPU: Google Colab.  This movie is in public domain category and it is Copyright free.

metadata.Plot: The small kingdom of Marshovia has a little problem. The main taxpayer, the wealthy widow Sonia (who pays 52% of the taxes) has left for Paris. So Count Danilo is sent to Paris, to stop her from getting married to a stranger, so that the danger of removing the money is averted. But this is not as easy as the ambassador in Paris has planned.
metadata.Writer: Ernest Vajda, Samson Raphaelson, Viktor Léon
metadata.Actors: Maurice Chevalier, Jeanette MacDonald, Edward Everett Horton
